```{=html}  
<!-- RAISINS Learning Hub Intro (compact + mobile friendly) -->
<section class="raisins-hero is-compact" aria-label="Welcome to RAISINS Learning Hub">
  <div class="rh-bg"></div>
  <div class="rh-pattern"></div>

  <div class="rh-wrap">
    <span class="rh-chip">welcome</span>
    <h1 class="rh-title">RAISINS learning hub</h1>
    <p class="rh-sub">
      your comprehensive space for mastering data analysis with RAISINS-interactive guides, real examples,
      and clear, step-by-step guidance that make statistics simpler and more accessible.
    </p>

    <ul class="rh-highlights" role="list">
      <li>step-by-step</li>
      <li>interactive</li>
      <li>smooth reading</li>
      <li>statistics, sweeter</li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</section>

<style>
/* tune spacing via css vars */
.raisins-hero {
  --rh-pad-y: 2.2rem;
  --rh-pad-x: 1rem;
  --rh-radius: 16px;
  --rh-maxw: 880px;
  --rh-title-size: clamp(1.35rem, 3.2vw, 2rem);
  --rh-sub-size: clamp(.95rem, 1.3vw, 1.05rem);
  --rh-chip-size: .7rem;
  --rh-gap: .5rem;

  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: var(--rh-radius);
  padding: var(--rh-pad-y) var(--rh-pad-x);
  margin: .75rem 0 1.25rem;
  isolation: isolate;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 22px rgba(0,0,0,.06);
}

/* optional extra-slim mode */
.raisins-hero.is-compact {
  --rh-pad-y: 1.6rem;
  --rh-radius: 14px;
  --rh-title-size: clamp(1.25rem, 2.8vw, 1.8rem);
  --rh-sub-size: clamp(.92rem, 1.1vw, 1rem);
}

/* animated background (subtler) */
.raisins-hero .rh-bg {
  position: absolute; inset: 0;
  background:
    radial-gradient(900px 480px at 10% 10%, rgba(99, 102, 241,.18), transparent 60%),
    radial-gradient(700px 420px at 90% 20%, rgba(16, 185, 129,.18), transparent 55%),
    linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fc 0%, #ffffff 60%);
  z-index: -2;
  animation: rh-shift 18s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
}

/* soft floating dots (smaller) */
.raisins-hero .rh-pattern::before,
.raisins-hero .rh-pattern::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  width: 180px; height: 180px;
  top: -32px; right: -32px;
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, rgba(0,0,0,.07), transparent 60%);
  filter: blur(10px);
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: rh-float 12s ease-in-out infinite;
  z-index: -1;
}
.raisins-hero .rh-pattern::after {
  top: auto; bottom: -40px; right: auto; left: -32px;
  width: 210px; height: 210px;
  animation-duration: 14s;
}

/* content */
.raisins-hero .rh-wrap {
  max-width: var(--rh-maxw);
  margin: 0 auto;
  text-align: left;
}

.raisins-hero .rh-chip {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: var(--rh-chip-size);
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: .08em;
  background: #0b5a56;
  color: #fff;
  padding: .3rem .55rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(11, 90, 86, .22);
  animation: rh-pop .8s ease both .1s;
}

.raisins-hero .rh-title {
  margin: .6rem 0 .3rem;
  font-size: var(--rh-title-size);
  line-height: 1.15;
  color: #1f345c;
  letter-spacing: -.015em;
  animation: rh-rise .8s cubic-bezier(.2,.7,.2,1) both .05s;
}

.raisins-hero .rh-sub {
  margin: .15rem 0 .9rem;
  font-size: var(--rh-sub-size);
  color: #3b4250;
  max-width: 62ch;
  animation: rh-fade .8s ease both .18s;
}

/* highlights */
.raisins-hero .rh-highlights {
  display: flex;
  gap: var(--rh-gap);
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  padding: 0; margin: .25rem 0 0;
  list-style: none;
  animation: rh-fade .8s ease both .28s;
}
.raisins-hero .rh-highlights li {
  font-size: .88rem;
  padding: .38rem .6rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.85);
  border: 1px solid rgba(31,52,92,.12);
  color: #0b5a56;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

/* animations */
@keyframes rh-rise { from { transform: translateY(8px); opacity: 0 } to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1 } }
@keyframes rh-fade { from { opacity: 0 } to { opacity: 1 } }
@keyframes rh-pop { 0% { transform: scale(.96); opacity: 0 } 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1 } }
@keyframes rh-float { 0% { transform: translateY(0) } 50% { transform: translateY(6px) } 100% { transform: translateY(0) } }
@keyframes rh-shift { 0% { background-position: 0% 0% } 100% { background-position: 100% 100% } }

/* dark mode */
:root[data-theme="dark"] .raisins-hero .rh-bg {
  background:
    radial-gradient(900px 480px at 10% 10%, rgba(99, 102, 241,.16), transparent 60%),
    radial-gradient(700px 420px at 90% 20%, rgba(16, 185, 129,.14), transparent 55%),
    linear-gradient(135deg, #0b1324 0%, #121a2b 70%);
}
:root[data-theme="dark"] .raisins-hero { box-shadow: 0 8px 26px rgba(0,0,0,.32); }
:root[data-theme="dark"] .raisins-hero .rh-title { color: #e8eefc; }
:root[data-theme="dark"] .raisins-hero .rh-sub { color: #c6cfde; }
:root[data-theme="dark"] .raisins-hero .rh-highlights li {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.06);
  border-color: rgba(255,255,255,.1);
  color: #9fe4d7;
}

/* mobile tweaks */
@media (max-width: 680px) {
  .raisins-hero {
    --rh-pad-y: 1.2rem;
    --rh-pad-x: .9rem;
    --rh-title-size: 1.25rem;
    --rh-sub-size: .95rem;
    margin: .5rem 0 1rem;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0,0,0,.05);
  }
  .raisins-hero .rh-pattern::before,
  .raisins-hero .rh-pattern::after {
    width: 150px; height: 150px;
    filter: blur(8px);
  }
  .raisins-hero .rh-highlights li {
    font-size: .85rem;
    padding: .32rem .55rem;
  }
}

/* motion safety */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .raisins-hero * { animation: none !important; transition: none !important; }
}
</style>
```
